reviews.sentence: While hospitality is good price is reasonably good giving value for money rating but hygiene accommodation facilities get average rating as to get good or excellent rating I would need more then expected. WiFi though free but not in rooms. At price it gives its worth making you realise you are in a 2 star propety.

NICE STAY. The rooms were very presentable and good to use. Amenities were provided to me to my expectations and in terms of view the room is good as well. The breakfast also tasted really well with quality Overal a great stay in the hotel.

Pleasant staff and good hotel. Had the weekend at Ginger with not much work so I did spend a fair amount of time in the hotel. it is a pretty good hotel and ideal for people who are happy self serving. The best part of the hotel is the reception lobby. During the hot hours of the day free glasses of lime juice are placed as a relief from the Sun. The 24x7 Cafe Coffee Day counter is excellent and the staff is always pleasant.

Good Experience. The Room was in good clean condition. The Staff at the hotel were cordial and welcoming. The location is excellent. This is my first time with Ginger and we are impressed with the facilities. The Breakfast buffet is fairly good but needs improvement. Overall a very good experience.

Manageable. This hotel is manageable. The facilities are okok only location importance may attract people like us I shal not recommend for familie stay. Service are not good. More cleanliness to be ensured. Price is also not good comparing to facilities.

Excellent Service and Stay. In the month of June I have visited to this place. Hotel was located in the city centre and can be reached easily without any difficulty. Building appearance was very good. Parking facility was available. No delay in check in and checkout procedure. Very good in service and behaviour of staff. Online booking was available. Complimentary breakfast was available. Room was excellent in maintenance with all the amenities available. Swimming pool and gym was available for refreshment. Suggestible place to others as well.

Good business Hotel. Ginger Bhubaneswar is good business hotel for travellers who are having business appoints want to have smart stay. The hotel is clean all facility aviable required for business travelers. The good party is the hotel has atm facility in the campus so if any one requires cash can get it. Over all good expersince.
Gud hotel with all required amenities. Staff is also good.

Reception staff is so good. Sunita Subham are 2 smiling faces that I love to communicate. At d booking time. plz show the exact room details. I booked for single large bed. They provided 2 single beds.

The overall experience is very good and homely also. The people like Sunita Malick Door I Lenka at reception are very Good. In the service part Prashant Sushant are also very co operative. Overall experience is pretty good. Also the back end guys are too good.
Location is good. Rest of the. Room was below par and quite cramped for even an extra beds to fit in location is good facilities are very basic.

Good Stay. Getting a decent place to stay in Bhubaneswar in a budget hotel is difficult. Most 2star and 3star hotels are similarly priced. The options are limited and a 3star hotel with the most basic of basic amenities is your best bet. Although the city is safe in general the idea of women travelling alone for a longer duration is still not a widely accepted concept. So be prepared to garner some wide eyes sometimes cold tones and scanning stares from people. Having said all of that my stay at Ginger was very comfortable the staff were pleasant to interact with and the ambience was hospitable. it is a busy place and the staff seemed on their toes throughout the day too. There is really nothing much to do around except a few eateries. So you are dependent on the hotel restaurant for your meals especially if you are there for work. I really hoped they served some traditional meals rather than the regular Chinese Mughlai options. The hotel is a bit overpriced for the amenities it provides but like I mentioned earlier this is kind of a norm here. So it is actually adequately priced as compared to other similarly priced hotels. Ginger still is a good option compared to some dingy place near the station as it is somewhat conveniently located and is comfy for a short staybr The room was comfy except the AC did not really work and the view was not too great directly opposite the restaurant building.
Ginger hotel. Need lots of improvement in cleanlinesbr Rom cleanliness need to be improved. Amenities in bathroom should be complete.
Dinning hall service. Behavior of a dining hall service attendant not up to the mark. To be trained properly.

Pathetic service. Rooms claustrophobic. Stuff behavior quite rude. Not value for money though they claim so as their business model. Lift gets stuck often. Too many power cuts. Horrible food. Its almost like a lodge given the price.
Terrible Stay. Hotel reception staff behavior is not good and talking with customer very rudely.

Nice stay. Nice stay for business traveller. Very conveniently located with efficient service. Hotel is under renovation in view of damages suffered due to cyclone Fani. Wifi is yet to be activated. Hotel however is fully functional with efficient front desk and service staff. can not comment upon restaurant and bar as did not use the facilities. Overall a nice experience.
Excellent Stay. A very pleasant experience. They provide all the necessary amenities characteristic of a first rate Hotel.

Below average property. It did not Worth it is credibility since the room provided to me was below par and toiletries were missing from the toilet and the towel were even provided on demand. There were hardly any place inside the room to accommodate chair table and a looking mirror forget about the writing table.
Not so good. Reception says wifi is free but on checkout they charged for wifi.
